sentence.text: A major susceptibility locus, HIVAN1, was previously mapped to chromosome 3A1-A3 in a cross between TgFVB and transcription initiation from RNA polymerase I promoter/EiJ (CAST) strains, and introgression of a 51.9 Mb segment encompassing HIVAN1 from CAST into TgFVB resulted in accelerated development of nephropathy.

entity.text: transcription initiation from RNA polymerase I promoter

sentence.text: Of these, craniofacial suture morphogenesis, cellular response to starvation, and Setd7 have been implicated in the pathogenesis of nephropathy.
